example.name: need an infinitive

roleset.note: The latter is properly a modal verb, but we'll tag it anyway.

example.name: need both an NP and an S
example.text: Prosecutors-1 need court permission *trace*-1 to obtain the tax returns of an individual or a business.
example.arg: *trace* to obtain the tax returns of an individual or a business.

example.name: need an S
example.text: I need you to pay attention to the frames files!
example.arg: you to pay attention to the frames files

roleset.note: Note the difference in structure between the two preceding examples. The key is the presence/absence of the trace in subject position of the lower clause.
